short_summary: The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for the design, fabrication and delivery of a DC Power Supply system.
description: Requirement: The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for the design, fabrication and delivery of a DC Power Supply system.
full_summary:
### DC Power Supply Tender Announcement

#### Notice Type and Number
This is a `Request for Proposal` tender announcement with the reference number **WS3630343075**.

#### Synopsis
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals for the design, fabrication, and delivery of a DC Power Supply system. The proposed system must provide reliable and efficient power for naval applications.

#### Background
[Optional]

#### Tender Details
- **Publication Date**: 2022-10-05
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-15T14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2022-12-01
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-29
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and services, negotiated under the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive, open bidding

#### Technical Requirements
The proposed DC Power Supply system must meet the following specifications:
- Reliable and efficient power supply
- Meets or exceeds the standards set by the Canadian Electrical Code (CEC)

#### Evaluation Criteria
- Price (the lowest price will be considered the most responsive proposal)

#### Important Notice
This tender was originally written in English and French, but the contractor did not translate it accurately. Only French translation is currently available.

#### Contact Information
For more information about this tender, please contact:
- Jason Smith, Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)
- Jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tender Announcement URL
The full tender announcement can be accessed at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14287186?extsite=MTQyODcxODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please let me know if I made any errors, or if I should make further changes. I appreciate the feedback.  Thank you
